doc.field: Kevin Kennedy Ephemera and Photographs Collection
Kevin Kennedy Ephemera and Photographs Collection
Series II: Photographs and Photo Negatives
Series II: Photographs and Photo Negatives

This series contains photographs and photo negatives covering a variety of subjects such as: St. Patrick's Day Parades, Ancient Order of the Hibernians events, United Irish Counties events, Knight of Columbus events, Ireland, Irish football clubs, weddings, and church events.
The collection also contains photographs of Mayor Ed Koch, Gerry Adams, Governor Mario Cuomo, Governor George Pataki, and President Bill Clinton.
